product_name: Giro Hex Bike Helmet - Extra Large
long_description: Built for demanding trail rides, the Giro Hex bike helmet adjusts easily and quickly for a perfect fit, and offers plenty of cooling airflow to ensure you're comfortable as you're shredding. Hex helmet suggested uses inlcude MTB all-mountain and trail riding, and MTB endurance/marathon. Roc Loc 5 retention system makes adjusting fit tension and vertical position easier and more comfortable than ever; loosen/tighten with a simple twist. In-mold technology bonds the helmet's tough outer microshell to the impact-absorbing expanded polystyrene liner, creating a light, cool and strong helmet. 21 vents ensure great airflow around head. Visor offers 15deg of vertical adjustment.
